Name: Capellan Warrior House
Details: The Capellan Confederation Armed Forces include many military units but few are as prestigious as the Warrior Houses. Each Warrior House is an autonomous monastic military organization that reports directly to the Chancellor of the Confederation and stands apart from the regular CCAF command structure. Service to a Warrior House is considered a great honor and each House has its own martial traditions. The current Warrior Houses are Imarra, Kamata, Hiritsu, Lun Sann, Dai Da Chi, Fujita, Ma-Tsu Kai, and Ijori.
